articles.description: 'Games wide open' is the motto for this year's Paris Olympics, which officially begin on Friday with the opening ceremony.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: Seine, security and familiar faces - French capital prepares for Olympic Games

articles.description: France turn on the style to overwhelm Argentina - their recent antagonists - and reach the Olympics men's sevens semi-finals in Paris.
articles.title: Paris 2024: France beat Argentina after Antoine Dupont, Aaron Grandidier and Andy Timo tries

articles.description: The United States, managed by former Chelsea boss Emma Hayes, begin their Olympic campaign with an emphatic win over Zambia.
articles.title: Hayes guides United States to large win over Zambia

articles.description: England captain Ben Stokes says fast bowler Mark Wood is getting “closer and closer” to breaking the 100mph barrier.
articles.title: 100mph bowling: Ben Stokes makes Mark Wood prediction

articles.description: Your day-by-day guide to what is happening when - and who to watch out for - at the Paris 2024 Olympics.
articles.title: Olympics schedule & day-by-day guide to key events & British medal hopes at Paris 2024

articles.description: Simone Biles lands a spectacular vault in Paris training to make a huge statement in a low-pressure return to the Olympic stage.
articles.title: Simone Biles makes Olympic return with podium training at Paris 2024

articles.description: Former marathon world champion Paula Radcliffe says she is "very sorry" after wishing a convicted rapist competing at the Olympics the "best of luck".
articles.title: Paula Radcliffe apologises for wishing convicted rapist luck at Olympics

articles.description: Seven-time Olympic swimming champion Caeleb Dressel says he is not confident rivals are not doping at the Paris Olympics.
articles.title: Paris 2024 Olympics: Caleb Dressel has fears over doping amid ongoing row

articles.description: Lando Norris feels McLaren's team orders drama at the Hungarian Grand Prix has "clouded over" team-mate Oscar Piastri's  maiden Formula 1 victory.
articles.title: Belgian Grand Prix 2024: Lando Norris regrets McLaren's team orders row overshadowed Oscar Piastri's maiden win

articles.description: The Court of Arbitration for Sport dismisses Russia's appeal against the reallocation of 2022 Olympic team figure skating medals.
articles.title: Kamila Valieva: Russia's appeal over stripped Olympic gold medal dismissed
